price: U ovom Kur’anu Mi na razne načine objašnjavamo ljudima svakovrsne primjere, ali je čovjek, više nego iko, spreman raspravljati.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ لِلنَّاسِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖۚ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَكۡثَرَ شَيۡءٖ جَدَلٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣarrafnā fī hādhā al-qur'āni lilnnāsi min kulli mathalin wakāna al-insānu akthara shayin jadalan
